parameters.broken:
factor indicating whether the marriage or permanent
relationship was broken (yes, no).
parameters.rank: factor indicating social rank (I, II, III, IV, V).

title: Broken Marriage Data
description:
Description
Data from the Danish Welfare Study about broken marriages or permanent
relationships depending on gender and social rank.
reference:
E. B. Andersen (1991),
The Statistical Analysis of Categorical Data, page 177.
format: A data frame with 20 observations and 4 variables.
